title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in even after resetting their password multiple times.

title: Payment Failed
description: Payment keeps failing despite using multiple cards. Error code: TXN402.

title: Order Not Delivered
description: Customer claims their package has not arrived even after the delivery date passed.

title: Refund Request
description: Customer requested a refund for a faulty product received last week.

title: App Crashing Frequently
description: Mobile app crashes on startup for Android version 11 and above.

title: Incorrect Billing Amount
description: Customer was charged twice for the same order.

title: Account Suspended
description: Customer's account got suspended without any warning or reason.

title: Unable to Update Profile
description: Customer cannot update their profile picture or bio.

title: Email Not Receiving OTP
description: Customer not receiving OTP during login, causing delay in verification.

title: Subscription Auto Renewal Problem
description: Subscription did not auto-renew even though auto-pay was enabled.
